import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './App.css' import Header from './component/Header' import axios from 'axios' const App = () => { const [editMode, setEditMode] = useState(false) const [list, setList] = useState([]) const [task, setTask] = useState('') const showTodos = async () => { try { const { data } = await axios.get('/api/show/todos') setList(data) } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } useEffect(() => { showTodos() }, []) return ( <>
{ editMode ? : }
{ list && list.map(val => ( )) }
# Task Date Actions
{val.id} {val.task} {val.dateCreated}
) } export default App
